Message:
I hear the sounds of
footsteps in the soil.

The night was dark,
and Cerberus clung to
me tightly.

I knew I had to run,
but all my legs could do
was tremble...

The creatures saw me
frozen with fear and laughed.

With a howl,
they plunge towards us.

Sharp claws pin me down,
and flithy fangs tear at my neck.

Her scream was joined by
the sudden downpour of
lightning.

When I woke up, I was alone
at the bottom of a cliff,

and the cursed lightning
was blanketing the land.
